name: Meteor Blasters
description:
Overview

Meteor Blasters is a modern re-imagining of the classic 80s Asteroid shooters from the early arcades.
Asteroids are causing havoc through the galaxy and you've been deployed to destroy as many as you can.

Other machines have been deployed to assist in the destruction of the space rocks but be careful that they don't hit you by mistake!

Features

Choose from 6 ships, each offering a variety of performance differences.

Weapon upgrade system where you'll need to match the color of your ship to the powerup color.

1 to 4 Player Co-Op arcade action.

2 to 4 Player Versus Mode.

High Score Leaderboards to see if you're the best space pilot.

Procedurally generated levels.

Old school inertia based physic controls.

Full Joypad Support.

Lots of Steam Achievements.

NOTE: Keyboard and Mouse is NOT Supported
